name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon Price Tracker like Keepa but Free

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See & track the historical price of any item on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keepa style, it adds price history charts on all Amazon sites. You can track & view the historical price of any product on Amazon.

Have you ever found a product you really want to buy on Amazon but you're not sure if it's currently priced high or low? With this extension, you can see the price trends of the product over time, allowing you to determine if it's currently a good deal or if you should wait for a better price.

NOTE:
-Works on â‰ˆ95% of all Amazon products
-Please wait 4-5 sec. before the chart loads
